title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce solution built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, payment processing, inventory management, and admin dashboard.
challenges: Implementing secure payment processing and real-time inventory updates
solutions: Integrated Stripe API for payments and implemented WebSocket connections for real-time updates

title: SnapBook - Photo Sharing Platform
description: Collaborative photo sharing application similar to Google Photos. Team project featuring album creation, image upload, sharing capabilities, and user management.
challenges: Managing large file uploads and implementing efficient image optimization
solutions: Used Firebase Storage with image compression and lazy loading for optimal performance

title: Portfolio Website v1
description: My first professional portfolio website built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Showcases clean design principles and responsive web development fundamentals.
challenges: Creating responsive layouts without frameworks and implementing smooth animations
solutions: Used CSS Grid and Flexbox for layouts, and vanilla JavaScript for interactive animations

title: Task Management API
description: RESTful API for task management with user authentication, CRUD operations, and role-based access control. Built with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL.
challenges: Implementing complex authorization logic and optimizing database queries
solutions: Used middleware for authentication and implemented database indexing for performance

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Real-time weather application with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and weather alerts. Integrates multiple weather APIs for comprehensive data.
challenges: Handling multiple API integrations and creating responsive charts
solutions: Implemented error handling with fallback APIs and used Chart.js for data visualization

title: Blog CMS
description: Content Management System for blogs with rich text editor, user roles, comment system, and SEO optimization. Built with modern full-stack technologies.
challenges: Implementing SEO-friendly URLs and managing content relationships
solutions: Used Next.js dynamic routing and implemented proper meta tag management
